resume_text:
NAME: Bob Johnson
EMAIL: bob.johnson@email.com
PHONE: (555) 987-6543

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience in automating infrastructure and streamlining deployment pipelines. Proven ability to improve system reliability and efficiency.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Git, Jenkins, Ansible, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Gamma Industries - DevOps Engineer (2016 - 2020)
- Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and Ansible.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.

Delta Technologies - Site Reliability Engineer (2020 - 2024)
- Managed and monitored cloud infrastructure on AWS.
- Improved system uptime and performance through proactive monitoring.

EDUCATION:
Stanford University - Master's in Computer Engineering (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
